item.title: DIS
item.description: score:-32 Chances: March jobs data will come out on Friday, which will impact the market’s performance The battle for control of Walt Disney Co’s board of directors is creating uncertainty for the company Risks: The entertainment powerhouse is struggling with its streaming operations, which could impact its long-term growth potential The market rally will be put to the test with the release of the labor market strength report Score:-32 chances characters count - risks characters count = -32

item.title: EDR
item.description: score:158 Chances: Endeavor Group Holdings Inc. has shown growth potential through its innovative rights deals and exclusive live events in the Owned Sports Properties segment. The company’s Events, Experiences & Rights segment owns and operates several successful events, including the Miami Open and New York Fashion Week.
